note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Socialmediacleanup
tagline: In theory, you need to authorize this application to access your twitter, facebook, linkedin etc...and it will search through your entire history and remove any posts that older then N number of days old.
body:
SocialMediaCleanUp
==================

In theory, you need to authorize this application to access your twitter, facebook, linkedin etc...and it will search through your entire history and remove any posts that older then N number of days old.
